attributes.action: Remove ethylene glycol from general sale.
attributes.additional_details: To stop accidental or deliberate poisoning of animals and humans. Including the use in suicide.
attributes.background: Look to remove ethylene glycol from common sale to general public and make it licenced to all others like motor, air industries etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want to see the banning of ethylene glycol itself or products containing it. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
